meanings.definition: A bicentennial is a period of 200 years.
meanings.sent1: The town celebrated its bicentennials with a big parade.
meanings.sent2: Many countries mark their bicentennials with special events.
meanings.sent3: The bicentennials of the ancient civilization were commemorated with a grand festival.
meanings.sent4: The bicentennials of history seemed to echo through the old buildings.
meanings.sent5: The concept of bicentennials can make history feel more tangible.

meanings.definition: Bicentennials is the plural form of bicentennial.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed artifacts from various bicentennials.
meanings.sent2: Scholars often study different bicentennials to understand the past.
meanings.sent3: The collection showcased the diversity of bicentennials around the world.
meanings.sent4: In the library, books about bicentennials filled the shelves.
meanings.sent5: The idea of bicentennials can spark curiosity about different time periods.
